reviews.name: Microwave for simple usage but still great help
Great compact option with quick set features.
reviews.reviewBody:
This Insignia 700w 0.7 cu ft microwave is a fantastic choice for anyone looking for a compact, efficient, and user-friendly microwave. Its combination of convenience, and thoughtful features makes it a great addition to any small kitchen. Highly recommended!

Compact Size:
One of the biggest advantages of this microwave is its compact size. At 0.7 cu ft, it fits perfectly in any small kitchen without taking up too much counter space. It's ideal for those with limited space but who still want the convenience of a microwave. Would be a great option for an RV or dorm as well. 

Quick Set Buttons:
Convenience is key, and the quick set buttons (numbers one through six) are a great feature. With a single press, you can set the microwave for one to six minutes, saving time and effort when you need to heat something quickly.

Preset Functions:
This microwave comes with nine preset functions, each with three settings. Whether you're popping popcorn, defrosting meat, or reheating a beverage, these presets take the guesswork out of cooking times and power levels.

Glass Turntable:
The 10-inch glass turntable ensures that your food is heated evenly. It's also easy to remove and clean, which is a big plus for maintaining the microwave.

Cord Protector:
The inclusion of a cord protector on the back of the unit is a thoughtful feature. It prevents potential damage from sliding the microwave too far back against the wall and pinching the cable. 

Secure Door Locking Mechanism:
The door locking mechanism is sturdy and secure, ensuring that the door stays closed during operation and preventing any accidental openings.

descriptions.long: Heat food quickly and efficiently with this Insignia NS-MW7WH5 .7 Cu. Ft. Compact Countertop Microwave. Nine preset functions take the guesswork out of cooking common foods like popcorn and baked potatoes, and a .7 cu. ft. interior provides room for meals without taking up too much space. A 10-in (25.4 cm) glass turntable works to evenly distribute heat while 700 watts and 11 power levels let you cook or reheat meat, vegetables and more. This microwave has an integrated child lock for safety and a bright LED display that lets you operate the device in low-light conditions. Finally, a modern white finish looks fantastic in any kitchen. Enjoy delicious meals while conserving kitchen space with this compact Insignia microwave.

reviews.name: Small Enough to be Stealth Like
reviews.reviewBody:
The Insignia™ .7 Cu. Ft. Compact Microwave in black is for those of us that need something small in stature, preserving your usable real estate, but mighty in function that gives us a choice in microwaving. The unit arrived well packed, but to tell the truth, not much is included- the unit comes with the glass turntable and circular piece for underneath the turntable, and 3 owner's manuals in English, Spanish, and French. This is the newer version of this Insignia model per my review of Best Buy's website. I was impressed that this unit has 2 separate defrost settings-either by time or weight. 

One of my first impressions is that when you grab the handle, you must push the gray piece inside the handle to open the door. The manufacturer refers to this as a 2-step safety feature for those that might have children trying to use the microwave. I have never experienced that with a microwave, no matter what the size has been. I also like easy and setting the clock is a no brainer. As you can see with the attached photos, the A/C plug is on the right back side when looking at the front of the unit. I personally had no issues with its length as I reached to plug it in, how convenient.

There are multiple pre-settings for your ease of operation or the time clock, and the black color will easily match your design.  In fact, there are even 2 defrost options- either by time or weight that is unusual, I think, in a modestly priced microwave unit. The buttons are labelled in white and visually comfortable to see. That is important to me since I am 65 years old. I have put this unit in my office's front room for not only my quick use adjacent to my working office, but for any of my clients that might want to warm up their coffee or other hot beverages that they might come in with. I have only used this briefly since receipt, but I believe that this is a good choice at a reasonable price.

reviews.name: Awesome replacement for a Samsung model.
reviews.reviewBody: I had whirlpool products before and made a huge mistake to switch to Samsung. I still have Whirlpool products outperforming newer Samsungs. reviews.name: Good, basic microwave
reviews.reviewBody:
I actually placed an order for this microwave in mid May.  The item did not come in & order cancelled.  I placed a second order early June which was ready for pick up late June, and was installed early July.
Installation was made using the previous wall bracket, but more holes were required to attach to the upper cabinet.  Not too bad, took about an hour with 2 people.
The microwave operates as expected, although it is still new.  Hope it lasts longer than the last one!

reviews.name: GE microwave
reviews.reviewBody: Bought this to replace our 20 year old ge microwave. Instalation was easy and worked great for a while but then had problems with it only heating intermittently. Called GE for service and they came out and got it fixed so hopefully it will last now

reviews.name: Great microwave
reviews.reviewBody: Its incredibly quiet. Very easy installation. Door opens easily,  doesn't require any force to open. Love it! Great price on sale for $219!

reviews.name: GE microwave, convection oven, airfryer combo purc
reviews.reviewBody: I recently purchased a GE microwave, convection oven, airfryer, combo. I love my new appliance. It works great, looks good, and is quiet. Now I only have one appliance on my counter. The product was delivered early, to my door. Best Buy kept me informed as the product was ordered, shipped, and delivered. I would purchase from Best Buy online, again. Thank you

reviews.name: Best All in One Convection GE Microwave
reviews.reviewBody: I have had GE appliances since I could remember, and this product is top notch for our son that just started college, he has been able to air fry the things he once did at home but thanks to the all in one convection  with air fry, our son is the popular kid in the dorm to get their Air Fry on Thanks GE and Best Buy for stocking this item

reviews.name: Best of Both Worlds
reviews.reviewBody: Our washer died and since we got such a good deal on the replacement from Best Buy as well as 18 months no interest, we decided to relace our aging microwave and wanted to also free up storage space in the kitchen by eliminating the bulky air fryer we got as a hand-me-down. This model takes up the same amount of space as our old microwave, is way quieter, and performs perfectly. There are some quirks to operation that you will only discover by reading the manual and using it as instructed, so I would strongly recommend not tossing the book in the trash. The air fryer function is very easy to use and I appreciate the “HOT!” warning the screen gives me when turning something being air fried. Make sure you are only using the high-rise platform when it is necessary. Most stuff you can air fry using the shorter one. I saw other reviews for this model when I was comparing and almost all of them that complained about it burning were putting their food up too high and too close to the heating element.

primaryImage.altText: The text on the image is a list of cooking times for various dishes, such as frying, baking, and roasting. The list includes instructions for cooking potatoes, pizza, and espresso, among other dishes. The cooking times are indicated by numbers, such as 2, 3, 4, and so on. The list is organized in a way that allows users to easily reference the appropriate cooking time for their desired dish.

descriptions.long: At GE Appliances, we bring good things to life, by designing and building the world's best appliances. Our goal is to help people improve their lives at home by providing quality appliances that were made for real life. Whether it's enjoying the tradition of making meals from scratch or tackling a mountain of muddy jeans and soccer jerseys, GE Appliances are crafted to support any and every task in the home.

features.title: Auto Connectivity
features.description: Auto Connectivity conveniently syncs your microwave and compatible range or cooktop by using the SmartThings App. The hood fan and LED lighting will automatically turn on and off when you turn your cooktop on or off, saving you time and extra effort.¹

features.title: Wi-Fi Connectivity
features.description: Connect your microwave to Wi-Fi and the SmartThings app to remotely adjust ventilation speed, lighting, and cook time right from your smartphone, and receive alerts when heating or cooking is finished.¹

features.title: 2.1 cu. ft. Oven Capacity
features.description: The 2.1 cu. ft. capacity has plenty of room to hold larger serving sizes and prepare a variety of foods quickly and easily.

features.title: Sensor Cook
features.description: Sensor Cook takes the guesswork out of your cooking by automatically adjusting cooking time for optimal results.

features.title: 400 CFM Ventilation
features.description: Extra power ventilation refreshes air quickly to remove steam and odors that result from cooking and ensures a comfortable and healthy cooking environment.

features.title: SmartThings Cooking
features.description: Enjoy a smarter way to cook with the SmartThings App¹. SmartThings Cooking provides recipe recommendations and a guided cooking experience to make meal time easy.

features.title: SmartThings Energy
features.description: SmartThings lets you monitor and manage your power usage. Get energy saving tips and alerts to help lower your electric bill.¹

features.title: Voice Control
features.description: Control your microwave using voice control.² With Samsung Bixby,³ Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant, you can turn your microwave’s ventilation and lighting on and off with a simple command.

features.title: Fingerprint Resistant
features.description: Fingerprint resistant⁴ for an everyday, beautiful finish.

features.title: Ceramic Enamel Interior
features.description: The beautiful ceramic blue enamel interior is scratch resistant and easy to clean. This durable ceramic enamel interior provides a polished surface that’s easy to maintain.
Effortlessly remove grease or oil from surfaces and protect against scratches that occur from daily use.

features.title: Eco Mode
features.description: The Eco Mode button conserves power by turning off the display when not in use, so there's no need to unplug with this energy saving microwave.

features.title: Home Dessert
features.description: The home dessert preset menu includes a wide selection of cooking options, so you can have easy sweets right at your fingertips.
¹Requires Wi-Fi, SmartThings app on Android or iOS device and Samsung account required.
²A Wi-Fi connection and a Samsung account are required.
³Voice commands are available on Android and iOS devices.
⁴Bespoke White Glass finish is not fingerprint resistant.

reviews.name: Good, basic microwave
reviews.reviewBody:
I actually placed an order for this microwave in mid May.  The item did not come in & order cancelled.  I placed a second order early June which was ready for pick up late June, and was installed early July.
Installation was made using the previous wall bracket, but more holes were required to attach to the upper cabinet.  Not too bad, took about an hour with 2 people.
The microwave operates as expected, although it is still new.  Hope it lasts longer than the last one!

features.title: Auto Connectivity
features.description: Auto Connectivity conveniently syncs your microwave and compatible range or cooktop by using the SmartThings App. The hood fan and LED lighting will automatically turn on and off when you turn your cooktop on or off, saving you time and extra effort.¹

features.title: Wi-Fi Connectivity
features.description: Connect your microwave to Wi-Fi and the SmartThings app to remotely adjust ventilation speed, lighting, and cook time right from your smartphone, and receive alerts when heating or cooking is finished.¹

features.title: 2.1 cu. ft. Oven Capacity
features.description: The 2.1 cu. ft. capacity has plenty of room to hold larger serving sizes and prepare a variety of foods quickly and easily.

features.title: Sensor Cook
features.description: Sensor Cook takes the guesswork out of your cooking by automatically adjusting cooking time for optimal results.

features.title: 400 CFM Ventilation
features.description: Extra power ventilation refreshes air quickly to remove steam and odors that result from cooking and ensures a comfortable and healthy cooking environment.

features.title: SmartThings Cooking
features.description: Enjoy a smarter way to cook with the SmartThings App¹. SmartThings Cooking provides recipe recommendations and a guided cooking experience to make meal time easy.

features.title: SmartThings Energy
features.description: SmartThings lets you monitor and manage your power usage. Get energy saving tips and alerts to help lower your electric bill.¹

features.title: Voice Control
features.description: Control your microwave using voice control.² With Samsung Bixby,³ Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant, you can turn your microwave’s ventilation and lighting on and off with a simple command.

features.title: Fingerprint Resistant
features.description: Fingerprint resistant⁴ for an everyday, beautiful finish.

features.title: Ceramic Enamel Interior
features.description: The beautiful ceramic blue enamel interior is scratch resistant and easy to clean. This durable ceramic enamel interior provides a polished surface that’s easy to maintain.
Effortlessly remove grease or oil from surfaces and protect against scratches that occur from daily use.

features.title: Eco Mode
features.description: The Eco Mode button conserves power by turning off the display when not in use, so there's no need to unplug with this energy saving microwave.

features.title: Home Dessert
features.description: The home dessert preset menu includes a wide selection of cooking options, so you can have easy sweets right at your fingertips.
¹Requires Wi-Fi, SmartThings app on Android or iOS device and Samsung account required.
²A Wi-Fi connection and a Samsung account are required.
³Voice commands are available on Android and iOS devices.
⁴Bespoke White Glass finish is not fingerprint resistant.

reviews.name: Good, basic microwave
reviews.reviewBody:
I actually placed an order for this microwave in mid May.  The item did not come in & order cancelled.  I placed a second order early June which was ready for pick up late June, and was installed early July.
Installation was made using the previous wall bracket, but more holes were required to attach to the upper cabinet.  Not too bad, took about an hour with 2 people.
The microwave operates as expected, although it is still new.  Hope it lasts longer than the last one!

reviews.name: GE microwave
reviews.reviewBody: Bought this to replace our 20 year old ge microwave. Instalation was easy and worked great for a while but then had problems with it only heating intermittently. Called GE for service and they came out and got it fixed so hopefully it will last now

reviews.name: Affordable microwave

reviews.name: Affordable and Efficient
reviews.reviewBody: I purchased this over-the-range microwave at an amazing price and was pleasantly surprised by how affordable it was. I needed to replace my old microwave and didn’t even realize that Insignia is a Best Buy brand. I’ve had this microwave for over six months now, and I have to say it performs much better than my previous GE model. While GE is a reputable brand, my old microwave just wasn’t heating up as efficiently as this one. I’m really impressed with how well this Insignia microwave works, and I hope it lasts a long time. So far, I’d give it five stars, and I trust Best Buy to stand by their products…

reviews.name: Amazing service
reviews.reviewBody: I was little apprehensive to get me a over the range microwave. Now that I see it...wow it looks beautiful and has made me so happy i decided to go with best buy for service and installation. I looked into other competitors but Best Buy was the best in regards not only on the product but the installation part. My microwave needed an outlet in the wall to be installed and the team that came over did everything to make sure the installation came out perfect. They are professionals, corteus and overall very satisfied from the company that came over they gave me updates on arrival via txt and phone call. They took all the garbage with them and left my kitchen looking Amazing

descriptions.long: Give your kitchen the upgrade it needs with the appliances you deserve. The Insignia NS-OTRB16SS3 1.6 Cu. Ft. Over-the-Range Microwave has 1000W of power and a 1.6 cu. ft. interior that make it perfect to cook or reheat meals for the entire family. Nine auto-cook settings, ten power levels, a defrost setting and a two-speed hood fan grant ideal heating for any type of dish or occasion. Control it all with a simple and straight-forward digital LED display and buttons. A removable 13.6 in. glass turntable ensures that your food is evenly heated and makes cleaning the inside of the microwave easy. Offering a modern design, this Insignia over-the-range microwave saves you counter space and illuminates the work surface below while adding an expensive feel to your kitchen décor.

videos.title: Know Before You Buy: Over-the-Range Microwaves

descriptions.long: The 800 Series over-the-range microwave has a spacious cavity and variety of modes to accomplish everyday cooking tasks from large to small. An efficient and powerful vent also handles smoke and odors with ease. Paired with unparalleled Bosch quality materials and craftsmanship, this microwave is designed to perform day in and day out.

features.description: Large 1.9 cu. ft. capacity to fit a variety of dishes
1000 watts of microwave power and 12 one-touch modes for cooking, defrosting and reheating
Multi-speed 385 CFM efficiently removes steam, smoke, grease and odors
Touch controls with printed display panel make selecting modes easy
Auto cook programs automatically select the time and power level for perfect results
Soften ice cream or cream cheese, melt chocolate or butter
Convection bake
Rack included for two-level cooking
Turntable on-off ensures food is cooked evenly
2 LED lights brightly illuminate the interior for easy viewing- 3 levels; high, low, off
5 adjustable levels of fan speed accommodate your ventilation needs

reviews.name: DO NOT PURCHASE
reviews.reviewBody: I purchased this item from Best Buy less than a month ago and this morning, the heating element burnt out and stopped working. Horrendous customer service from Best Buy as they said it was outside of the 15-day return window and my only chance to get my money back was to call GE. I will no longer buy GE microwaves but more importantly, I no longer will buy appliances from Best Buy.

reviews.name: Rattling noise
reviews.reviewBody: This seemed like a nice microwave at first, but after a couple if weeks, it started to make a rattling noise. We think it may be a fan inside.

reviews.name: Outstanding Technology!  Worth Every Penny!
reviews.reviewBody:
This microwave is sleek, streamlined, and beautiful.  It’s also a workhorse as it takes less time to heat things in this unit than it did in our old full size unit that was higher wattage.  At first we were going to mount it ourselves, but one quick look in the box and we decided $139 for a Geek Squad install was money well spent and we were right!

The only downside to this is the price with installation coming in at $550, however, if it’s what you want and if the new technology lasts as long as our old unit (still working and given to neighbors) it’s a really good investment.

reviews.name: Great over the stove microwave
reviews.reviewBody: I have had this for about a week, and I can't believe how much better it cooks than my old microwave!  I wanted a shorter unit over my stove, so I had more room above my pots, and this is perfect!  My only complaint is that the controls are behind the door, so I have to retrain myself to put in the cook time, etc, before I close the door.

reviews.name: Great microwave that is easy to install
reviews.reviewBody: I have a handyman business and I have installed many microwaves. This is the easiest one I have ever installed. I don't think they could make the process any more fool proof. I think most homeowners could install this unit no problem. The low profile look is great and the microwave has been working great.

specifications.definition: Each microwave style has its own benefits. Built-in, over-the-range, and drawer style microwaves help save counter space. Over-the-range microwaves also provide necessary ventilation in place of a range hood. Countertop microwaves allow versatility in placement and do not require professional installation.

External vents pull air from the room and move it directly outside through a dedicated duct system. Recirculating vents pull the air through a filter so that it can be cleaned before being recycled back into the room. Convertible vents can be reconfigured from external ventilation to recirculating via installation of certain parts.

features.title: Low profile design
features.description: Maximize space by moving your microwave off the countertop with a low profile design that fits in the same space as your undercabinet hood.
(Based on 24" minimum install for undercabinet hoods and Low Profile Microwave Hood.)

features.title: Purposeful capacity
features.description: Fit tall glasses, wide plates and big bowls in this low profile microwave that still has enough room for all the essentials with 1.1 cu. ft. of purposeful capacity.

features.title: 400 CFM motor class high performance venting
features.description: Keep your kitchen smelling like home with 400 CFM motor class high performance venting that quickly gets rid of smoke, odor and moisture. (Performance varies based on installation. Resources available at aham.org).

features.title: Tap-To-Open door
features.description: Keep things clean and dinner moving with a door that can open with the simple tap of a wrist or elbow, so you can access the microwave without putting dishes down.

features.title: Concealed touch controls
features.description: Controls stay out of the way and easy to clean with a smooth touch panel that's hidden behind the microwave door for a modern look.

features.title: 90º Hinge Door
features.description: Install your microwave hood next to a wall if necessary with a 90º hinge door.

features.title: Popcorn preset
features.description: Automatically get the settings you need to cook popcorn right and help prevent burning.

features.title: 1,000-Watt cooking power
features.description: Get quick and even cooking with 1,000 watts of cooking power.

features.title: Turntable On/Off option
features.description: Choose whether the turntable rotates or not to accommodate a wide range of dish sizes.

features.title: Dishwasher-safe turntable plate
features.description: Clean up spills on the turntable by simply putting it in the dishwasher.

features.title: Microwave presets
features.description: Get just the right amount of heat and time, whether you're cooking or defrosting, with specific preset options.

features.title: Add 30 seconds option
features.description: Quickly set the microwave timer to 30 seconds or add it to already in-progress cooking time with the touch of a button.

features.title: 10 power levels
features.description: Help prevent undercooking and overcooking with 10 power levels to match your dish.

features.title: Finished sides
features.description: There's nothing to hide with sides that are finished to match the rest of the microwave.

features.title: Easy install
features.description: Easily make a change and replace your current vent hood or microwave hood using a wall plate that helps you install right out of the box.

specifications.definition: The out of box weight of the item.
The out of box depth of the item. Depth is measured as the distance from the front of the item to the back as it would be primarily used or placed.
Setting that allows appliance to be temporarily locked to prevent use.

Minimum required height of the installation location for a standard installation of the product. This measurement will help you determine if the appliance will fit into the desired space and have the clearance necessary for proper operational use. Please refer to the manufacturer’s installation documentation for detailed measurement requirements.

Each microwave style has its own benefits. Built-in, over-the-range, and drawer style microwaves help save counter space. Over-the-range microwaves also provide necessary ventilation in place of a range hood. Countertop microwaves allow versatility in placement and do not require professional installation.

External vents pull air from the room and move it directly outside through a dedicated duct system. Recirculating vents pull the air through a filter so that it can be cleaned before being recycled back into the room. Convertible vents can be reconfigured from external ventilation to recirculating via installation of certain parts.
Strength of electrical current.

Please refer to the manufacturer’s installation documentation for detailed measurement requirements.
The measurement of the internal cavity of the microwave from top to bottom, side to side, and front to back, listed as height by width by depth.

features.title: 2-Speed, 300 CFM Motor Class
features.description: Match the right amount of ventilation to the dish being prepared and quickly get rid of cooking odors with two different fan speed settings. (Performance varies based on installation. Resources available at aham.org.)

features.title: Dishwasher-Safe Turntable Plate
features.description: Clean up spills on the turntable by simply putting it in the dishwasher.

features.title: Microwave Presets
features.description: Get just the right amount of heat and time, whether you're cooking or defrosting, with specific preset options.

features.title: Add 30 Seconds Option
features.description: Quickly set the microwave timer to 30 seconds or add it to already in-progress cooking time with the touch of a button.

features.title: Electronic Touch Controls
features.description: Navigate through cooking modes and options with controls that are as easy to use as they are to clean.

features.title: Adjustable Cooktop Lighting
features.description: Keep an eye on what's cooking below the microwave or keep a nightlight on in the kitchen.
